text:
Two things in life are certain: Pizza is incredible and the stars of the CW's Riverdale are God's great gift to this Earth. And when you combine the two, it's perfection.

Riverdale star Camila Mendes 'grammed an über-chic photo of herself over the weekend. In the snap, she's posing with co-stars KJ Apa (Archie Andrews) and Charles Melton (the new Reggie Mantle) with the best prop: Domino's pizza. She appropriately captioned the photo "Domino's Resort 2017 Collection" in what I can only hope is some sort of weird Fashion Week collab with the brand. I can dream, OK?! Leave me alone.



Everything about this photo is perfection, almost too much perfection really. (Seriously, how are they all eating pizza but not having to deal with any greasy cheese stains?!) The cast is currently shooting season two of Riverdale in Vancouver — presumably this pizza party happened between takes.

Season one, you'll recall, left off with Archie's dad Fred, played by Luke Perry, shot by a mysterious assailant in Pop's Chock'lit Shoppe. The ultimate cliffhanger left viewers with no choice but to wait until the season two premiere this October to find out if Fred lives or dies, and the anticipation is killer (pun very much intended but also please hang in there, Fred!).

Until then, only social media can satisfy your Riverdale withdrawals. More pictures, please, Cami. A girl needs her fix.
